title: Ritchey Ultra mountain bike returns retro red, white & blue Team fade for 50th Anniversary
content:
Ritchey’s next bike to get a limited 50th Anniversary edition is the Ultra hardtail mountain bike, bringing back that iconic red, white & blue Team…

The post Ritchey Ultra mountain bike returns retro red, white & blue Team fade for 50th Anniversary appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
